author: jeremias
msg: Added safe-guard against reuse to avoid problems with the renderers.

Removed reset() method. Compared to the many hundred object instances that get created by the FO tree and layout engine, the Fop and FOTreeBuilder instance are negligible. Better keep the API as simple as possible and create an environmental class in the long run.

author: snoopdave
msg: Updating readme and changelist for release

author: pdodds
msg: Updated the handling for a Service Assembly to automatically deploy the component to the install directory.
Also added mkdirs to make sure the deploy/install directories exist.
